name: Roger's Farewell
description:
Better Late Than Never

Roger knows he is about to die. Before dying, he really wants to complete some of his last wishes. Help Roger fulfill his wishes... But, wait! He didn't have enough time to fulfill them all!... Doesn't matter! He can fulfill them as a ghost. Play 4 fun mini-games and make his wishes come true!

This game was made for the #IndieDevDayGameJam.

The Team

· Aylin Torunlar - 3D Artist

· Juan Belío - Game Designer, 2D Artist

· Marçal Tineo - Game Programmer, 3D Artist

· Sergi Monreal - Game Programmer

Tips & Tricks

  • The Controls are WASD keys for Movement, E key for Interaction, and Space to fly up (Parachuting mini-game).
